segments.text: What do you think of this one ?
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Hug ! And this sweater from my aunt ? Isn ’ t it hideous ?
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Are you even listening ? I ’ m trying to have a conversation with you .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: And I ’ m trying to watch the game , but you ’ re yapping on about your new clothes !
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: Well I have to decide which gifts to keep and which to exchange for better ones when I go to the Boxing Day sales this afternoon !
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Well could you do me the favor of making this quick ? It ’ s the third quarter and you ’ Ve been blabbering on since the first !
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: Oh , your precious game . You watch the same game every year , and each year your beloved hometown team loses by at least three goals !
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Oh no you didn ’ t . You didn ’ t just insult the Sals-bury Seals , did you ? Why don ’ t you just . just go and return all of those stupid clothes and not come back until the sales are over ?
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: I might just ! Enjoy your stupid game !
segments.speaker: S1
